overview.title2: Supercharge your content with one of the fastest networks in the world.

flags.title: Your users are just a hop away
flags.subTitle: Hop on a global network that spans 6 continents and 77 countries.

hop.title: Hop on the Fastest Global CDN Network
hop.subTitle: Get started in seconds. No Credit Card Required. Cancel anytime.

header.title: DDoS protection as standard
header.content: Protect your website from DDoS Attacks. Ensure flawless uptime and never go down again. We take care of DDoS protection so you can focus on your product!
header.hint: No credit card needed. Start in seconds.

protectAtEdge.title: DDoS protection at the network edge
protectAtEdge.subTitle: Stay protected at all times by mitigating attacks before they ever reach your servers, thanks to Edge AI.

stayProtectAlways.title: Stay protected. Always!
stayProtectAlways.subTitle: Stay focused on your product and let us take care of your security.

header.title: DDoS protection as standard
header.content: Protect your website from DDoS Attacks. Ensure flawless uptime and never go down again. We take care of DDoS protection so you can focus on your product!
header.hint: No credit card needed. Start in seconds.

onProblem.title: One problem. One routing system.
onProblem.content: Traditionally, CDNs will route users with a single routing configuration which isn't always optimal. SmartEdge™ combines a pre-set global configuration with automatic performance metrics to intelligently select between anycast, GeoDNS, and latency-based routing for each region to maximize performance and routing quality for your specific use case.

WebTools.bennerSubTitle: Tools to help you optimize and get started with bunny.net and run network tests and diagnostics from over 120 locations around the world.

neverHit.title: Never hit your origin again
neverHit.subTitle: Minimize traffic to your origin and lower costs by serving files directly from Perma-Cache. Gowaf keeps your infrastructure hopping, regardless of scale or traffic spikes.

DNSLookur.title: DNS Lookup Test
DNSLookur.subtitle: Enter the URL of your file or website to test connectivity from the Gowaf.net network to your server.

DiagnosticReport.title: Diagnostic Report
DiagnosticReport.subtitle: The diagnostic report will collect detailed information about your browser, internet and DNS configuration  that can be used for testing connectivity and troubleshooting issues.

OtherTools.title: Other Tools
OtherTools.subtitle: SSL Check, GeoIP Lookup, and more!
